name: Website SEO Audit
special_instructions: The 'maxRequestsPerCrawl' and 'maxDepth' options allow you to limit the scope of the audit. If not specified, the tool will crawl an unlimited number of pages and depths.
The 'userAgent', 'viewPortWidth', and 'viewPortHeight' options allow you to simulate different devices and screen sizes for the audit.
The 'pageTimeout' and 'maxRequestRetries' options allow you to control the tool's behavior in case of slow or unresponsive pages.
The 'handlePageTimeoutSecs' option allows you to specify how long the tool should wait for each page to process.
The 'seoParams' option allows you to override the internal SEO parameters used by the tool.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
